page.title: 14RENISHAW
page.content: THE FIRM OF RENISHAW IS ONE OF THE LARGEST EMPLOYERS IN THE AREA OF WOTTON-UNDER-EDGE.THE COMPANY WAS STARTED IN 1972 BY TWO FORMER EMPLOYEES OF ROLLS ROYCE.THEY RECOGNISED A GAP IN THE HIGH-TECH PRECISION ENGINEERING MARKET FOR ACCURATE ELECTRONIC MEASURING.THEY INVENTED AND NOW PRODUCE TOUCH TRIGGER PROBES.THESE ARE FITTED TO PRECISION MACHINERY USED TO PRODUCE HIGH-TECH PRODUCTS.THE COMPANY HAS RECEIVED NO LESS THAN FOUR QUEEN'S AWARDS TO INDUSTRY, IN FIVE YEARS, FOR THEIR OUTSTANDING EXPORT ACHIEVEMENTS. THE FIRM NOW EMPLOY 380 BASED AT THREE SITES IN AND NEAR THE TOWN. NEW MILL IS THE MAIN PRODUCTION SITE. THE ORIGINAL WORKS IN THE CENTRE OF THE TOWN IS THE ADMIN. CENTRE AND A MODERN DISUSED FACTORY IS THE RESEARCH DEPT.
